text: Man Trouble is a 1992 American romantic comedy movie. Ellen Barkin plays Joan. Jack Nicholson plays Harry. Beverly D'Angelo plays Andy. It was directed by Bob Rafelson and written by Carole Eastman, who together had been responsible for 1970's Five Easy Pieces. This movie did not have good reviews from critics. It flopped at the box office. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1992 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Italian romance movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Movies set in California Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Bob Rafelson
title: Man Trouble
